description:
I am always trying to find some balance of "types" of guys, and I was excited to have a nice naturally hairy guy come in to do a solo.
Manning is 25, and very mature for his age. There really is a difference between 19-20-year-old and give years of maturity.
He likes all kinds of girls, and when asked if they minded his body hair, he basically says, they just have to deal with it.
Not sure, but I think I have very few guys with beards on the site. Sure, some scruff here and there, but I think Manning has a full on beard.
He thankfully likes to show off, and is quite good at giving us a performance.
Pretty certain he is down for some oral action, so stay tuned for next week!
title: Manning - Solo
